item.title: Bachata
item.description: Bachata Routines Bachata - Incognito Dance Bachata Routines Drop By Drop will Makes My Ocean Ritika Cornell Raasta Workshop: 1st 4 beats of 180 turn, then turn the lady 2 times, and wrap her hand around your neck. Cornell Ritika Raasta Workshop Incognito: Incognito Lock & Drop Hand Flick Labels Bachata - Incognito Dance Bachata Dance Partner Work Course - Improvers Level - Incognito Dance

item.title: Kizomba
item.description: Kozomba on Fire Kizomba Steps Kozomba on Fire Difference Between Taraxa and Kizomba So taraxa is slow movements the wave movements that lady moving the hips. And when you are very slowly dancing with your lady or with your partner because the music is smooth there are not many strong beats. Taraxa - Wave and Double Time I will be like these feet apart. Relax. One man one hand on the belly another on the back.

item.title: Dance
item.description: Daily Dance Routine Jan 2023 Dance Challenge Dance Challenge - May 2022 Dance Improvement - May 2022 Exercise / Stretching Daily Dance Routine Jan 2023 Warm Up 1 Like Woh Woh (Swag + Running Man) Salsa 8s Salsa 8s (Blindfolded) Bachata Hip Movements Dance Challenge Target to finish one challenge per week. By the end of 2 months you will have lot of skills up your sleeve. Dance Challenge - May 2022 Dance Improvement - May 2022 Body Wave

item.title: Salsa
item.description: Salsa Salsa Shines Routine Salsa Dance Routine Seaon Stylist Bristol Section 1: Hour One Section 2: Hour Two Section 3 Steps YouTube Salsa Salsa Shines & Basic Routine 2 to 3 songs, when salsa hits me. Salsa Shines Brijendra: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JdXTTwRXZTQ Basic, Side Basic, Suzi Q, Side Back Cross, Heel Crusher, Right Turn, Left Turn, 4 Crosses, 4 Taps Left Turn Right Turn Front Basic Side Basic Salsa Dance Routine Basic, CBL Basic, CBL, Inside Turn Basic, Right Turn (holding both hands.
